sentences.en: Cidate must have strong previous project management experience on feign funded projects.
sentences.cn: 具有足够外国投资项目的先期项目管理经验.

sentences.en: Damage reduction while feign death removed.
sentences.cn: 假死是受到伤害减少效果移除.

sentences.en: Feign suggests false representation or fictitious fabrication.
sentences.cn: feign指错误的表现或人为的制造.

sentences.en: Feigning a headache, I went upstairs to my room.
sentences.cn: 我假装头痛，上楼到自己房间去了。

sentences.en: He used to feign an excuse.
Improved Feign Death ( Survival ): This talent has been replaced with Survival Tactics.
sentences.cn: 强化假死 ( 生存天赋 ) 这个天赋现在被生存战术替代.

sentences.en: In their coupling he would feign great passion until be began to believe it himself.
sentences.cn: 两情欢好的时候他总是装出极大的热情,到后来连他自己也信以为真了.

sentences.en: One morning, I didn't want to go to school, and decided to feign illness.
sentences.cn: 有天早晨我不想上学，于是决定装病。

sentences.en: She feign - ed to be asleep.
She knew that her efforts to feign cheerfulness weren't convincing.
sentences.cn: 她明白自己强作欢颜是瞒不了谁的.

sentences.en: Some animal feign death when in danger.
sentences.cn: 有些动物遇危险时便装死.

sentences.en: Some animals feign death when in danger.
sentences.cn: 有些动物遇到危险时便装死.

sentences.en: They refuse marriage and even feign poverty!
This feign death reflex is frozen afterwards by dissolution of memory.
sentences.cn: 这个假死的违反是冷酷的,通过随后的分散记忆.

sentences.en: To feel, or feign, decorous woe.
sentences.cn: 感到或装作适当的悲伤.

sentences.en: Welcome feign friends to come to rental.
sentences.cn: 欢迎外国朋友前来租住.

trans.tran_en: to pretend to have a particular feeling or to be ill, asleep etc

trans.tran_cn: 假装，伪装，捏造（借口、理由等），装作，创造或虚构
trans.tran_en: to pretend to have a particular feeling or to be ill, asleep etc
